name: Yumus adventure
description:
Yumu's an Axolotl that got drawn into a mystic temple that will lead our pink friend into the heart of the ruins that lie within. Developed by Uriel Flores Solís, Luis Vivanco Garín and Max Cruz Olivares. Know yumu and what destiny has prepared. (IMPORTANT) Should be played with an X-box one controller. 

PC commands

move- WASD

A-Space

B-Left click

Camera-Mouse
